title: Some of the biggest businesses we’ve built might not be as relevant going forward: Satya Nadella
description: Satya Nadella, the CEO of Microsoft, expressed concerns about the company's future. He fears Microsoft might fail to adapt to artificial intelligence. Nadella cited Digital Equipment Corporation as a warning. He acknowledged the need to improve Microsoft's work culture. Nadella wants to rebuild trust with employees. The company is committed to creating a better work environment.
content:

title: Students’ complicated relationship with AI: ‘Avoiding using it probably put me at a bit of a disadvantage’
description: As students get stuck into the academic year, there are strong feelings about whether artificial intelligence should play a role in their education
content: Walk into any university library, and on the screens of many students’ computers, a bright white website can be seen. The words “what can I help with?” appear before the student. One might ask it to summarise a literature review that they need to tal... [12042 chars]

title: Oracle in Talks With Meta on $20 Billion AI Cloud Deal
description: Under the multiyear deal, Oracle would provide the social media giant with computing power for training and deploying artificial intelligence models
content:
Oracle is in discussions with Meta for a cloud computing deal worth about $20 billion, providing further evidence that the company has become a significant infrastructure provider.

title: Nvidia hires Enfabrica CEO Rochan Sankar in $900 million deal
description: Nvidia is an American tech giant known for its graphics processing units (GPUs) for video games, artificial intelligence (AI), data centers, etc.
content: Nvidia is paying cash and stock, a deal reminiscent of AI talent acquisitions made by Meta and Google in recent times, CNBC reported. The deal was reportedly finalised last week and Enfabrica CEO has joined Nvidia, an American tech giant known for it... [635 chars]

title: NTUC Health deploys new AI software to predict fall risk of seniors
description: A new artificial intelligence (AI) software deployed by NTUC Health aims to predict the fall risk of seniors, allowing early intervention and prevention of actual falls.
content:

title: How to Use AI for Interior Renovation Success
description: Technology has surrounded all walks of life, and interior design is not left behind. What was once a task that included sleepless nights with contractors, architects, and designers can now be dreamt up and implemented with the assistance of artificial intelligence. title: AI Company Pirated YouTube Songs, Record Labels Say
description: The Suno lawsuit was amended with the record labels' claim that the AI company pirated YouTube songs to train its artificial intelligence model.
content: The major record labels are hitting AI music giant Suno with a new legal claim for allegedly scraping their songs from YouTube, taking a cue from Anthropic’s recent $1.5 billion copyright settlement while citing an exclusive Billboard report on mass ... [3445 chars]

title: Use of AI, cutting-edge tech vital for Armed Forces: CDS
description: chief of defence staff (cds), general anil chauhan, on friday said that adopting modern technologies, particularly artificial intelligence (ai), is of critical importance in strengthening india’s defence preparedness. future wars would not only be fought with conventional weapons but also on new frontiers such as cyber and space, and india must remain fully prepared for these challenges, the cds noted. in his address at the east tech symposium 2025, organised by the army’s eastern command at the khelgaon co
